thread.title: Coronation Street fans shock as Bethany Platt is seen sleeping with creepy Nathan in grooming storyline
thread.title_full: Coronation Street fans shock as Bethany Platt is seen sleeping with creepy Nathan in grooming storyline

author: Beth Abbit
title: Coronation Street fans shock as Bethany Platt is seen sleeping with creepy Nathan in grooming storyline
text:
Coronation   Teenager Bethany Platt ended up at Nathan Curtis flat during shocking scenes on Friday night   Thank you for subscribing!   
Shocked Coronation Street fans have reacted to a controversial storyline which saw Bethany Platt sleeping with Nathan Curtis. 
The teenager ended up at creepy Nathan’s flat after she was taken into town and plied with vodka by her new friend Mel. 
Groomer Nathan then took the vulnerable teen back home with him while she was drunk. Read More Sheridan Smith all smiles as she poses with her super-cute pet dog 
Viewers praised the decision to broadcast the child grooming storyline but were left feeling uncomfortable and shocked. 
Bethany, played by Lucy Fallon has been targeted by the much older Nathan Curtis, played by Chris Harper. 
He was previously arrested over suspicions about another girl’s disappearance, but was later released and asked Bethany to provide an alibi for him. 
The teen refused, but later realised he was actually innocent. 
Rushing to see him at the salon to apologise, she met Mel who took her out on the town - not realising she is in on the grooming scheme. 
Plying the teen with vodka Mel arranged for Nathan to meet her, and stole her phone. 
Bethany ended up sleeping with Nathan before he was seen on the phone telling someone “It worked like a dream...remember what I said - this girl is special.” Read More Who is Bethany Platt and Lucy Fallon the actress who plays her on Coronation Street? 
Next week Bethany will admit to mum Sarah that she and Nathan are dating, but lies about them sleeping together. 
Actress Lucy Fallon, who plays Bethany, warned it will be “uncomfortable viewing” as Nathan’s real intentions become clearer. 
Fans of the ITV soap have praised writers for tackling the child grooming storyline. 
The scenes sparked a lively conversation in Twitter. 
Alistair Geddes (@AlistairGeddes) wrote: “The Bethany storyline is disturbing, but if it helps even one person avoid the same situation, then it has worked. #Corrie #coronationstreet” Read More Creepy Nathan gets even creepier when he's arrested for abduction after kissing Bethany on Corrie 
Pritha Bardhan (@PrithaBardhan) commented on Twitter: “Shocked with what happened to Bethany on Corrie tonight but glad it’s being covered as it happens in the real world.” 
While Vikki Black (@Vikki-Black) posted: “Bethany is in so much danger. This storyline is so good. Showing how easy it is for young people to be groomed.” Like us on Facebook
